participant_1.background:
If they can't get along with my pets, I can't get along with them.
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.
I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, casual clothing that lets me move freely while I play music and write stories.
My sunflowers are beautiful and I am proud of them.

content.text: I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.
What movies will you watch?
The Goonies, probably. I'm also thinking about watching the original Home Alone or The Sandlot.
Oh, those are all great choices! I love The Goonies and Home Alone.
Me too! I have a whole box of old VHS tapes of movies I watched when I was a kid.
That's awesome! I love VHS tapes. They're so nostalgic.
Me too! I wish they were still around.
I know, right? It's so much harder to find old movies on DVD or Blu-ray.
I know! I've been trying to find a copy of The Goonies on DVD for years, but I can never find it.
Oh, no! That's so sad!
It is! But I guess it's just one of those things that I'll have to live without.
Well, at least you have the VHS tape!
Yeah, I guess that's true.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, write stories, and spend time with my pets.
Oh, that's cool! I like to play music too.
What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and piano.
Oh, that's awesome! I play guitar too.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Oh, that's cool! I like to play a lot of different genres too.
Me too! I think it's important to be open-minded about music.
I agree! There's so much good music out there, it would be a shame to limit yourself to one genre.
Definitely! I think everyone should try to listen to different types of music.
I agree! It's a great way to learn about new cultures and expand your horizons.
I know! I've found so many new bands and artists that I love by listening to different types of music.
Me too! It's so much fun to discover new music.
It is! I love finding new music that I love.
Me too! It's the best feeling.
I know! It's like finding a new friend.
Exactly!
I love music.
